Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Amazing bar with a lot of cocktails based on rum of course üñ§ would also recommend the warm white russian, it is to die for especially in the colder months! tip: on Sunday it is happy hour and all house cocktails are 6.50‚Ç¨

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Happy that Amsterdam has a proper rum bar with a good selection. The tiki drinks and ambiance outside on the terrace were nice on a sunny Saturday summer evening. When it started getting dark we moved inside, and also enjoyed sitting at the bar. Would recommend.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great selection of rum and rum cocktails. Cocktails are made very professionally and contain a good amount of alcohol. Service provided is warm and easy-going, but not the fastest - it was very full though. Can get loud in the not-too-big bar.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great bar. Elaborate and high quality menu. Very good drinks, delicious food and good vibes. I can only recommend this gem

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great hidden jewel. Huge selection of rums obviously. But also the food is fantastic. Really laid back place and very knowledge and helpful people working there. Great place for a good run and a cigar in a nice warm day. Oh yeah they sell cigars too. Heated terrace if you fancy it. Recommend

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Pretty much a hip place for Rum lovers. It's based on the Caribbean theme. Quite a lot of options available for food and drinks. The staff is pretty friendly and  comes with a long history. A must try is the Tiki Puca Puca. Cool place to hangout with friends but pricing looks slightly towards the higher end.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Best cocktails in Amsterdam,  great  terras and friendly professional staff.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Nice cocktails and friendly service, best cocktailbar in Oostpoort I've found

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: I visit this place at least every other week. One of the best places for cocktails. The staff is friendly. The vibe is chillax. Great bar bites (even though they downsized the menu a bit).

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: A Rum Bar! has good food, relaxing vibe, music isn't too loud. seating inside and out. friendly and attentive staff. spent 5 good hours here trying out the various rums and some bites. 5 years later and they are still great! The staff, food and atmosphere are still doing a fine job!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great place for Rum cocktails! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly! Great glassware, i always enjoy a fun cup and was not disappointed.  Food was also good!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Very friendly bartenders, and a good choice of tapas. The rum tastings are great for groups.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great people, great food, great music, best cocktails. One of my favorite joints in town.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Always amazing! Great place for drinks, atmosphere, service and great Rum.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Awesome cocktail bar! The interior has a great Carribean flair and the bar tenders really know how to create a nice cocktail!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Big selection of various cocktails served in funky glasses. Dinner/snack menu available too. Can get very crowded on Friday night.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Very nice cocktail, the staff was really friendly and provided good service. Food was also good. Only a little bit on the expensive side, but worth it.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Best cocktails and finger foods ever! The bar has a great vibe and cool decoration. And cigars! To be repeated for sureüçπ

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: I love the rum barrel! I always have a great time there, the staff is friendly and kind. My favorite rum bar in Amsterdam!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text:
Amazing little gem in the suburbs of Amsterdam.

Top food and very quick service. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Fun place, delicious drinks and good snacks!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: This place .. I dont know man like they hired cocktail wizards to work here. My favorite is spicey mulata...this cocktail is meaning of life. The only downside here is price... 11.50 for mulata? C'mon guys why are you so greedy?..4 stars for that.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great food and cocktails. My favorites were tuna and calamari, their sauces were incredible. Also drinks were not only super nice, but also quite presentable.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Fantastic.  If you're a rum lover I recommend this without hesitation.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text:
Very nice vibe and great selection of drinks & food !

Food needs a bit more salt and maybe spiceeee :-)

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Delicious food, tasty cocktails, extensive rum selection, and friendly workers all make up for a fantastic Saturday night out.  They accept reservations, which is good because it can get busy for the outdoor table spots. Perfect location for meeting up with friends and enjoying the croquettes, the ribs, and calamari.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: It's a small happy joint and I've never seen more kinds of rum offered in a menu elsewhere. There is indoor and outdoor seating. Rum Barrel offers more than a 100 kinds of Spanish, English and French rums and some very good cocktails. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Amazing cocktails, have the smoking gun! Service is top shelf. Guests are sociable. Food is quick and delicious. The hot navy proof cocktail is perfect end of meal. Loved the creme brulee. They stock union 55 (always support local)

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Very impressed. Their cocktails are fantastic and each and every tapas dish we ordered was perfect. Small cozy atmosphere with themed decor and music which, in combination with the generously poured cocktails gives you a holiday feeling, even on a damp and cold Amsterdam evening.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great cocktails. Be careful, they're more lethal than you think. Good snacks and food as well, but we all know you go here for the cocktails. Extensive menu with an excellent range of home made cocktails. The staff is attentive and very friendly. It's a small place but definitely worth visiting on the quiet end of the javastraat.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: It's a bit pricey, especially if you want to drink just rhum. They have a quite large choice and some are quite good too but you need to pay the price for it then. Went there a couple of times for their cocktails though and those are ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Rum tasting sets selection is amazing! And rum variety in general is equally great. Good food (smaller dishes, but it's actually good for the format) and nice cocktails - and the atmosphere to match.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Overall this place is great. The staff is so nice, funny and friendly. The cocktails are great and they really take their time explaining about the rum. I recommend the Mai Tai cocktail üòã.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great neighborhood bar to have excellent rum based cocktails, made with Caribbean passion, or to have tastings of exquisite Spanish, English and French styled rums. The owners somehow manage to get hold of an astonishing amount of varieties, rarely seen together. And the tiny kitchen produces some lovely snacks. A must go!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Lovely little bar that's our new local. About a zillion types of rum are available, but don't worry - Stefano will make the perfect recommendation for whatever rum-based cocktail suits your mood! Great snacks and a friendly vibe, too.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great tiki bar! Really nice selection of drinks served in interesting glasses. Staff were friendly. They have paid a lot of attention to detail with decor etc. We also had some food which was good and exactly what you want to accompany some ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text:
Nice place to drink Cocktails, if you like it strong
Rum Barrel looks quite nice, with an authentic interior. We liked the style of the entire bar. ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: One of the smaller, cozy cocktailbars in the east. The staff is always friendly (and quick!). The selection of cocktails (and the presentation) is pretty good. I've been here a few times and plan on visiting again in the future as well

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great place with very friendly staff & Alex who works behind the bar has good knowledge of Rums .

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Excellent service! We were a big rowdy group on a Sunday night and the staff treated us very well. The drinks were tasty and the food was great too - highlights were the tuna, the ribs (multiple people in our party call them the best in ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great place to hang out with friends. Relaxed Caribbean style music and food with amazing flavor! Staff are friendly and the owner is always willing to provide with good advice on what drink to pick! The ribs marinated in rum are incredible!!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: An amazing blend of some of the finest rums from the world over, with a tapas-style assortment of Caribbean bites that pair perfectly with the rums! ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: My first visit I only tried a couple of cocktails. And as their name will probably have told you already, those are mostly rum based. I like rum. But for me the world of rums is not as rich as let's say that of whiskies. But I'm always open ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great cocktails and unparalleled collection of rums. Owner is enthusiastic and knowledgeable and bar has a really nice equatorial vibe. The alcoholic ginger beer is certainly worth a try.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Myself and my partner visited recently and from the moment we entered we felt welcomed.the service was excellent and cocktails were great, but the chicken wings were to die for. Stunning. Definitely worth the trip.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Surprise to see this place here in Amsterdam, cocktails are amazing and they have small tapas that some are worth trying but the staff is very impersonal also only two persons trying to cook,serve and run the whole thing...This place has ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text:
Decent rhum menu but somewhat expensive.
Services is bad, dropped a full bottle of beers on 2 of my friends laps, didn't apologize but instead tried to make a joke about this being dutch hospitality.
Brought them another one that we still had to pay for.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Food was very flavoursome and the Rum was amazing a must for anyone looking for a bit of Caribbean flavour

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Consistently amazing food and cocktails. I always take guests here and they are always impressed. Lovely attentive staff. Don't go to dinner some place else, come here and eat the tapas style Cuban inspired foods.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great bar, amazing rum collection and friendly service.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: The only rum-themed bar in Amsterdam, Paul and Erik have made a masterpiece of the Caribbean! ‚Ä¶

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: The cocktails are tiki and the bar has a relaxed tiki vibe. We had an amazing evening with friends and enjoyed each cocktail. Food was good too. I would definitely return.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Really nice concept with great cocktails and snacks. Service was really good too (not just by low Amsterdam standards but in general). Don't have any criticisms.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great drinks, strong and nice! Delicious snacks! Must come if you love cocktails! üòç

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: A different concept to the ocean of G&T/craft beer swilling hipster joints currently on every corner. It's a Caribbean island in the Javastraat! An impressive selection of rums and tropical cocktails, and the food is great to go alongside it. Not really a place for dinner, but perfect for a borrel or a snack.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Best bar in Amsterdam! Amazing collection of Rum's

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: It's a little expensive but very good drinks, food and vibe so they made it worth.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: great service, hospitable, cocktail culture on point tried a variety of drinks well explained and prepared. true pro carribean experience in Amsterdam.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: I thoroughly enjoyed their cocktails as well as the incredibly friendly service. Great spot to start off the evening and they even have cigars! I highly recommend their mojito!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: I had a great time at Rum Barrel. The food is really good and their cocktails are amazing. A must visit when in Amsterdam.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: I love this rhum bar! One of the best in Amsterdam. And you can always find a seat, people are really kind and cool

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Very friendly staff, interesting menu and nice outdoor seating. It's a unique place and the service is very good. The prices are average and worth it as the food is very good. Nice drinks menu.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Friendly staff, great selection of original cocktails, definitely worth visiting every now and then!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Very tasty cocktails and delicious food. I appreciated that they make classical an new cocktails, with incredible flavours pairing.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Best cocktails in the neighborhood!!!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Nice place. Food is a straight 5/5! Would come again!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great drinks and amazing calamari!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great cocktails, friendly staff. Can take a while to get served when its crowded.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great place with a huge selection of rums and the staff really knows their stuff. Recommended!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Far too much rum for just a nightcap!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Currently having cocktails here & would recommend giving this place a visit great drink, friendly staff, chilled atmosphere

Name: Rum Barrel

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Such a nice environment! Great staff and amazing drinks!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Wide variety of excellent cocktails with friendly and knowledgeable staff. What's not to love...

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Totally chilled place with a beachy/ reggae/ latin vibe. Good cocktails, nice staff.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Friendly staff. Not the best cocktails in town, and yet a bit pricey.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Love this place. Some gorgeous Rums, great tapas plus super friendly and helpful staff.

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Friendly people and really nice drinks. Atmosphere is great, can definitely recommend going there!

Name: Rum Barrel
Review Text: Great atmosphere, huge collection of rums and the best (relatively cheap) cocktails in amsterdam
